title: NextJS Project - Coming soon!
description: A full-stack NextJs project featuring Prisma for database management.

title: Laravel Project - Jobs Board
description: A full-stack CRUD application, enabling users to post, edit and view jobs, and filter by category. Running on Laravel and MySql with Tailwind for styling.

title: Laravel & React CRUD Project
description: A basic admin panel that enables users to be created, deleted and edited. Utilising React on the front-end and Laravel on the back-end.

title: Code Op Solo MVP - React
description: A book club application, running on React and SQL/Node JS/Express. Featuring user management, the Google Books API and Bootstrap.

title: Code Op Group MVP - React
description: A group project, using React/Express.js/SQL to build a platform for dog walkers, with a live chat feature based on the TalkJS chat API.

title: Javascript Game
description: A space-invaders inspired game running on Javascript.
